Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ala15 maculatin 1.1 (A15M1.1, Synthetic AMPs, maculatin 1.1 P15A analog, UCLL1c, XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid SUBSTITUTION, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is 86.36% similar toMaculatin 1.1V: 19%; A: 24%. GRAVY: 1.3.Activity: Active against B.cereus (MIC >100 ug/ml), E.coli (MIC >100 ug/ml), L. lactis (MIC 12 ug/ml), L. innocua (MIC 100 ug/ml), M. luteus (MIC 50 ug/ml), P.multocida (MIC >100 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 50-100 ug/ml), S.uberis (MIC >100 ug/ml), S. epidermidis (MIC 100 ug/ml), S.faecalis (MIC >100 ug/ml), and S. uberis (MIC 50 ug/ml).Structure:  3D structure was determined in TFE.
Literature Information.Author: Chia BC, Carver JA, Mulhern TD, Bowie JH.2000
Literature Information.Title: Maculatin 1.1, an anti-microbial peptide from the Australian tree frog, Litoria genimaculata solution structure and biological activity.
